configurableConfig.description: File name will be derived from current date and time.
configurableConfig.label: Save Folder

config.text: Replace file with same name at destination

script:
readonly output="${save_in}/bin-$(date "+%F-%H-%M-%S")"
mkdir -p "${save_in}"

if [[ "${overwrite}" -eq 0 && -f "${output}" ]]; then
  echo "File exists: ${output}" >&2
  exit 1
fi

case "${in_format}" in
  base64) base64 --decode <<< "${1}" --output "${output}";;
  hex) xxd -plain -revert <<< "${1}" > "${output}";;
  *) echo "Invalid representation: ${in_format}" >&2; exit 1;;
esac

echo -n "${output}"
